verses.verse: And Jacob <WH3290> lived <WH3427> in the land <WH776> where his father <WH1> was a stranger <WH4033>, in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>.

These are the generations <WH8435> of Jacob <WH3290>. Joseph <WH3130>, being seventeen <WH6240> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, was feeding <WH7462> the flock <WH6629> with his brothers <WH251>; and the lad <WH5288> was with the sons <WH1121> of Bilhah <WH1090>, and with the sons <WH1121> of Zilpah <WH2153>, his father <WH1>'s wives <WH802>: and Joseph <WH3130> brought <WH935> unto his father <WH1> their evil <WH7451> report <WH1681>.

Now Israel <WH3478> loved <WH157> Joseph <WH3130> more than all his sons <WH1121>, because he was the son <WH1121> of his old age <WH2208>: and he made <WH6213> him a coat <WH3801> of many colors <WH6446>.

And when his brothers <WH251> saw <WH7200> that their father <WH1> loved <WH157> him more than all his brothers <WH251>, they hated <WH8130> him <WH3201>, and could not speak <WH1696> peaceably unto him <WH7965>.
And Joseph <WH3130> dreamed <WH2492> a dream <WH2472>, and he told <WH5046> it his brothers <WH251>: and they hated <WH8130> him yet the more <WH3254>.
And he said <WH559> unto them <WH8085>, Hear, I pray you <WH2472>, this dream which I have dreamed <WH2492>:

For <WH481>, behold, we were binding sheaves <WH485> in the field <WH7704>, and <WH485>, behold my sheaf arose <WH6965>, and also stood upright <WH5324>; and <WH485>, behold, your sheaves stood round about <WH5437>, and bowed <WH7812> to my sheaf <WH485>.

And his brothers <WH251> said <WH559> to him <WH4427>, shall you indeed reign <WH4427> over us <WH4910>? or shall you indeed have dominion <WH4910> over us <WH8130>? And they hated him yet the more <WH3254> for his dreams <WH2472>, and for his words <WH1697>.

And he dreamed <WH2492> yet another <WH312> dream <WH2472>, and told <WH5608> it his brothers <WH251>, and said <WH559>, Behold <WH2492>, I have dreamed a dream <WH2472> more <WH8121>; and, behold, the sun and the moon <WH3394> and the eleven <WH6240> stars <WH3556> bowed down to me <WH7812>.

And he told <WH5608> it to his father <WH1>, and to his brothers <WH251>: and his father <WH1> rebuked <WH1605> him <WH559>, and said unto him <WH2472>, What is this dream that you have dreamed <WH2492>? Shall I and your mother <WH517> and your brothers <WH251> indeed <WH935> come <WH935> to bow down <WH7812> ourselves to you to the earth <WH776>?
And his brothers <WH251> envied <WH7065> him <WH1>; but his father observed <WH8104> the saying <WH1697>.
And his brothers <WH251> went <WH3212> to feed <WH7462> their father <WH1>'s flock <WH6629> in Shechem <WH7927>.

And Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> unto Joseph <WH3130>, Do not your brothers <WH251> feed <WH7462> the flock in Shechem <WH7927>? come <WH3212>, and I will send you <WH7971> unto them <WH559>. And he said to him, Here am I.

And he said <WH559> to him <WH3212>, Go, I pray you see <WH7200> whether it be well <WH7965> with your brothers <WH251>, and well <WH7965> with the flocks <WH6629>; and bring <WH7725> me word <WH1697> again <WH7725>. So he sent <WH7971> him out of the valley <WH6010> of Hebron <WH2275>, and he came <WH935> to Shechem <WH7927>.
And a certain man <WH376> found him <WH4672>, and <WH8582>, behold, he was wandering in the field <WH7704>: and the man <WH376> asked him <WH7592>, saying <WH559>, What seek you <WH1245>?
And he said <WH559>, I seek <WH1245> my brothers <WH251>: tell <WH5046> me <WH375>, I pray you where they feed their flocks <WH7462>.

And the man <WH376> said <WH559>, They are departed <WH5265> here <WH2088>; for I heard <WH8085> them say <WH559>, Let us go <WH3212> to Dothan <WH1886>. And Joseph <WH3130> went <WH3212> after <WH310> his brothers <WH251>, and found <WH4672> them in Dothan <WH1886>.
And when they saw <WH7200> him afar off <WH7350>, even before he came near <WH7126> unto them <WH5230>, they conspired against him to slay him <WH4191>.
And they said <WH559> one <WH376> to another <WH251>, Behold <WH1976>, this dreamer <WH1167> comes <WH935>.

Come <WH3212> now therefore <WH2026>, and let us slay him <WH7993>, and cast him into some <WH259> pit <WH953>, and we will say <WH559>, Some evil <WH7451> animal <WH2416> has devoured <WH398> him <WH7200>: and we shall see what will become of his dreams <WH2472>.
And Reuben <WH7205> heard <WH8085> it <WH5337>, and he delivered him out of their hands <WH3027>; and said <WH559>, Let us not kill him <WH5221>.

And Reuben <WH7205> said <WH559> unto them <WH8210>, Shed no blood <WH1818>, but cast <WH7993> him into this pit <WH953> that is in the wilderness <WH4057>, and lay <WH7971> no hand <WH3027> upon him <WH5337>; that he might rid him out of their hands <WH3027>, to deliver <WH7725> him to his father <WH1> again <WH7725>.

And it came to pass <WH3130>, when Joseph was come <WH935> unto his brothers <WH251>, that they stripped <WH6584> Joseph <WH3130> out of <WH854> his coat <WH3801>, his coat <WH3801> of many colors that was on him <WH6446>;
And they took <WH3947> him <WH7993>, and cast him into a pit <WH953>: and the pit <WH953> was empty <WH7386>, there was no water in it <WH4325>.

And they sat down <WH3427> to eat <WH398> bread <WH3899>: and they lifted up <WH5375> their eyes <WH5869> and looked <WH7200>, and <WH736>, behold, a company of Ishmeelites <WH3459> came <WH935> from Gilead <WH1568> with their camels <WH1581> bearing <WH5375> spice <WH5219> and balm <WH6875> and myrrh <WH3910>, going <WH1980> to carry it down <WH3381> to Egypt <WH4714>.
And Judah <WH3063> said <WH559> unto his brothers <WH251>, What profit <WH1215> is it if we kill <WH2026> our brother <WH251>, and conceal <WH3680> his blood <WH1818>?

Come <WH3212>, and let us sell <WH4376> him to the Ishmeelites <WH3459>, and let not our hand <WH3027> be upon him <WH251>; for he is our brother and our flesh <WH1320>. And his brothers <WH251> were content <WH8085>.

Then there passed <WH5674> by Midianites <WH4084> merchants <WH582>; and they drew <WH4900> and lifted up <WH5927> Joseph <WH3130> out of the pit <WH953>, and sold <WH4376> Joseph <WH3130> to the Ishmeelites <WH3459> for twenty <WH6242> pieces of silver <WH3701>: and they brought <WH935> Joseph <WH3130> into Egypt <WH4714>.
And Reuben <WH7205> returned <WH7725> unto the pit <WH953>; and <WH3130>, behold, Joseph was not in the pit <WH953>; and he tore <WH7167> his clothes <WH899>.
And he returned <WH7725> unto his brothers <WH251>, and said <WH559>, The child <WH3206> is not <WH575>; and I, where shall I go <WH935>?
And they took <WH3947> Joseph <WH3130>'s coat <WH3801>, and killed <WH7819> a kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795>, and dipped <WH2881> the coat <WH3801> in the blood <WH1818>;

And they sent <WH7971> the coat <WH3801> of many colors <WH6446>, and they brought <WH935> it to their father <WH1>; and said <WH559>, This have we found <WH4672>: know <WH5234> now whether it be your son <WH1121>'s coat or no <WH3801>.

And he knew it <WH5234>, and said <WH559>, It is my son <WH1121>'s coat <WH3801>; an evil <WH7451> animal <WH2416> has devoured <WH398> him <WH3130>; Joseph is outside doubt <WH2963> tore in pieces <WH2963>.
And Jacob <WH3290> tore <WH7167> his clothes <WH8071>, and put <WH7760> sackcloth <WH8242> upon his waist <WH4975>, and mourned <WH56> for his son <WH1121> many <WH7227> days <WH3117>.

And all his sons <WH1121> and all his daughters <WH1323> rose up <WH6965> to comfort <WH5162> him <WH3985>; but he refused to be comforted <WH5162>; and he said <WH559>, For I will go down <WH3381> into the grave <WH7585> unto my son <WH1121> mourning <WH57>. Thus his father <WH1> wept for him <WH1058>.
And the Midianites <WH4092> sold <WH4376> him into Egypt <WH4714> unto Potiphar <WH6318>, an officer <WH5631> of Pharaoh <WH6547>'s, and captain <WH8269> of the guard <WH2876>.
